title: Publisher Rocket Tutorial: Step-by-Step Amazon KDP Research Tutorial | Sell more books on Amazon
description:
A step-by-step tutorial on how to use Publisher Rocket for Amazon KDP Keyword, Category, and Competitor Research that will help you sell more books.

This video will cover:
✅ How to find and pick the best Amazon KDP keywords for your books.
✅ How to choose your KDP book categories. 
✅ How to Analyze your Competitors or bestselling books in your genre on the Amazon kindle bookstore.
✅  + Tips from my personal experience publishing.
…and so much more!
